string-array.name: changelog_texts
string-array.item: • Fixed some text from old version that made no sense
• Updated support library\n• Added support for Android N settings link\n• Reduced APK size
• Remade app with new layouts\n• Added banner ads to app (donations will disable ads)
• Updated to newest libraries and rewrote app in kotlin
• Updated app to Android P\n• App has new material design\n• Asks for ads consent

resources.string: Check out other Apps by Developer

From APKMirror.com:

To figure out the right version of Google Play services for your Android device, go to Settings -> Apps -> Google Play services, and look at the last 3 numbers in the parentheses. You'll see something like -XYZ where:

X defines Android version:

0 for Android 5.0
2 for Android 5.0 and 5.1 starting with Play Services v8
4 for Android 5.0 and 5.1 before Play Services v8, Android >= 6.0 after
7 for Android 5.0
8 for Android TV

Y defines CPU architecture:

1 for armeabi
3 for armeabi-v7a
4 for arm64-v8a
7 for x86

Z defines DPI:

0 for universal
2 for 160
4 for 240
6 for 320
8 for 480
If you want more information on Google Play Services and other dpi dependent applications, please visit the settings.
This device DPI is %d\nIf you have found use out of this app and want to support future development, please consider purchasing premium
Dummy description that should do something
